item.title: [EU/CA][LogsDataPlatform] - TLS 1.3 by default
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 15, 13:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 16, 09:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/03/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 15/03/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : None, except if you do not support TLS 1.3.
Service improvement: Following our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an internal maintenance to enable TLS 1.3 by default on Logs Data Platform.

The cipher suites supported after this maintenance will be :
* TLS 1.2 Cipher Suites:
The server accepted the following 3 cipher suites:
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 256 ECDH: prime256v1 (256 bits)
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 128 ECDH: prime256v1 (256 bits)
* TLS 1.3 Cipher Suites:
TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 128 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)

item.title: [ALL][Public Cloud][Managed Kubernetes Service] - Cluster deletion requests return error
item.description:
Mar 2, 16:29 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 2023/02/28 06:00 UTC
End time : 2023/03/02 14:30 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : A malfunction was observed on the keystone update.

Mar 2, 14:49 UTC
Update - A patch has been applied with success. Our technicians are in the process of verifying the proper functioning of the product.

Mar 2, 13:37 UTC
Update - After identifying the root cause, our teams are working on the repair. We will make an update when progress has been made.

Mar 1, 15:23 UTC
Update - Our teams have discovered that a cluster reset may not work. They continue to work to resolve this issue.
Update will be published when significant update are made.

Mar 1, 10:51 UTC
Update - Existing clusters are impacted if the customer requests a deletion.
Cluster creation is operational again

Mar 1, 10:47 UTC
Identified - Existing clusters are not impacted.

Mar 1, 10:09 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 2023/02/28 06:00 AM UTC
Service impact : All Managed Kubernetes Service deletion requests return are not operational at the moment and the service will be marked as ERROR in the OVHcloud control plane and information displays by the APIv6 endpoints. Resources will be deleted by our team once the root cause detected and patch.
Ongoing actions :Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it
